titleStmt.title: A journey into Greece by George Wheler, Esq., in company of Dr. Spon of Lyons in six books ... : with variety of sculptures.
titleStmt.author: Wheler, George, Sir, 1650-1723.
Spon, Jacob, 1647-1685.

biblFull.extent: [14], 483 [i.e. 387] p., 7 leaves of plates : ill., 1 folded map.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Cademan, Robert Kettlewell, and Awnsham Churchill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.

(from t.p.) -- A voyage from Venice to Constantinople -- An account of Constantinople and the adjacent places -- A voyage through the Lesser Asia -- A voyage from Zant through several parts of Greece to Athens --An account of Athens -- Several journeys from Athens, into Attica, Corinth, Bœotia, &c.
